entry.title: WIND WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 07:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: NW 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
